you're_fired.name: you're fired
you're_fired.description: An exploding can of angry shouts to inform someone of their job loss.

you're_the_worst.name: you're the worst
you're_the_worst.description: An exploding can of angry shouts to inform someone that they are the worst.

curse_word_grab_bag.name: curse word grab bag
curse_word_grab_bag.description: A mystery selection of curse words to detonate in that awful neighbor's face.

mustard.name: mustard
mustard.description: A can of exploding mustard. Pairs well with exploding hotdogs (sold out).

chili.name: chili
chili.description: A tub of Wendy's finest under pressure.

ketchup.name: ketchup
ketchup.description: Drop from a tall building a walk away.

90's_laptops.name: 90's laptops
90's_laptops.description: A truck of laptops straight from the 90's for you to spread far and wide.

bats.name: bats
bats.description: Got a problem? Throw bats at it.

you're_always_right.name: you're always right
you're_always_right.description: Give them the gift of always being right. Blow it up in their face.

I_love_you.name: I love you!
I_love_you.description: Those three words sound so sweet when detonated.

You're_perfect.name: You're perfect
You're_perfect.description: Are they just plain perfect? You know they are. Let them know it too.

classic_glitter.name: classic glitter
classic_glitter.description: A glitter explosion of fun for your everyday needs.

uncle_sam_glitter.name: uncle sam glitter
uncle_sam_glitter.description: Show them how much you love America with this explosion of red, white and blue.

rainbow_glitter.name: rainbow glitter
rainbow_glitter.description: A multicolored glitterbomb for that special politician in your life.

chocolate_sprinkles.name: chocolate sprinkles
chocolate_sprinkles.description: An abudance of chocolate sprinkles to rain down on the masses.

m_and_m's.name: m & m's
m_and_m's.description: Little pellets of happiness all around.

starbursts.name: starbursts
starbursts.description: A mushroom cloud of starbursts at your fingertips.
